description: Untitled UI is the largest Figma UI kit with over 10,000 components, variants, and styles for designing modern interfaces. The kit includes comprehensive design tokens, documentation, and regular updates. For designers building applications, Untitled UI provides exhaustive component coverage. Its value lies in accelerating design work with a complete system.

name: Thind UI
description: Thind UI is a modern UI component library for React built with Tailwind CSS, offering accessible components ready for production. Components follow best practices for accessibility and customization. For designers and developers using Tailwind, Thind UI provides styled, accessible components. Its value lies in combining Tailwind styling with proper accessibility.

name: Blank
description: Blank is a minimal design system for Figma providing clean, simple components for modern interfaces without visual noise. The system emphasizes whitespace and clarity in its design approach. For designers seeking minimalist foundations, Blank provides an elegant starting point. Its value lies in its refined, minimal aesthetic.

name: Lumos
description: Lumos is a comprehensive Figma design system by Timothy Ricks featuring extensive components, variables, and documentation for building applications. The system includes dark mode, responsive variants, and design tokens. For designers building product interfaces, Lumos provides a complete design foundation. Its value lies in its thoroughness and professional quality.

name: TweakCN
description: TweakCN is a visual customization tool for shadcn/ui themes, allowing designers to generate custom color schemes and export configurations. The tool provides real-time preview of theme changes across components. For designers customizing shadcn/ui, TweakCN accelerates theme development. Its value lies in visual theming without manual configuration.

name: Studio 2AM
description: Studio 2AM provides creative tools and effects for designers including unique visual treatments and plugins for design workflows. The studio focuses on distinctive aesthetics and experimental design tools. For designers seeking unique visual effects, Studio 2AM offers creative differentiation. Its value lies in distinctive tools not available elsewhere.

name: Brand Toolkit
description: Brand Toolkit is a collection of essential branding resources including templates, guides, and tools for building cohesive brand identities. Resources cover brand strategy, visual identity, and implementation. For designers and brands developing identity systems, Brand Toolkit provides structured guidance. Its value lies in comprehensive branding resources in one place.

name: TextureLib
description: TextureLib is a free texture library providing high-quality textures for 3D, games, and design projects with various materials and surfaces. Textures are offered in multiple resolutions suitable for professional use. For designers and 3D artists needing surface textures, TextureLib provides free, quality options. Its value lies in accessible texture resources.

name: TextureLabs
description: TextureLabs offers free seamless textures and materials for 3D and design work, with textures designed to tile without visible seams. The library covers various material types from organic to manufactured surfaces. For 3D artists and designers, TextureLabs provides production-ready seamless textures. Its value lies in quality seamless textures at no cost.

name: Endless Tools
description: Endless Tools is an AI-powered design platform for generating patterns, gradients, and graphics using artificial intelligence. The platform creates unique visual assets through generative algorithms. For designers seeking AI-generated visuals, Endless Tools provides creative asset generation. Its value lies in AI-powered design asset creation.

name: DITHR Tool
description: DITHR Tool applies dithering effects to images, creating retro pixel aesthetics reminiscent of early computer graphics. The tool offers various dithering algorithms and color palette options. For designers seeking retro effects, DITHR Tool provides authentic dithering. Its value lies in accessible retro image processing.

name: STL to ASCII
description: STL to ASCII is a tool that converts 3D STL files into ASCII art representations, visualizing 3D models as text-based graphics. The tool is open-source and runs entirely in the browser. For designers and 3D artists seeking unique visualizations, STL to ASCII creates distinctive outputs. Its value lies in creative 3D-to-text conversion.

name: Kurt Mock-ups
description: Kurt Mock-ups provides premium device mockups for presenting designs in realistic device contexts with high-quality renders and various device options. Mockups are available in multiple formats for design tools. For designers presenting work, Kurt Mock-ups elevates design presentations. Its value lies in professional-quality mockup templates.

name: Supernova
description: Supernova is a design system platform for building, managing, and scaling design systems with documentation, tokens, and code generation. The platform bridges design tools with development workflows. For designers and brands maintaining design systems, Supernova provides comprehensive management. Its value lies in unifying design system operations.

name: Freepik
description: Freepik is a resource platform offering millions of free and premium vectors, photos, PSD files, and graphics for creative projects. The platform provides extensive search and filtering for finding specific assets. For designers needing graphic resources, Freepik offers vast selection and variety. Its value lies in breadth of available assets.

name: Pixabay
description: Pixabay is a free stock media platform providing photos, illustrations, vectors, and videos under a permissive license for personal and commercial use. The community-driven platform offers millions of assets. For designers seeking free stock media, Pixabay provides quality options without cost. Its value lies in generous licensing and selection.

name: Hinto AI
description: Hinto AI is an AI-powered design feedback platform providing instant design critiques and improvement suggestions for interfaces. The tool analyzes designs and offers actionable recommendations. For designers seeking objective feedback, Hinto AI provides automated critique. Its value lies in instant, AI-powered design analysis.

name: VidIQ
description: VidIQ is a YouTube growth tool providing analytics, SEO optimization, and insights for content creators to improve channel performance. Features include keyword research, competitor analysis, and trend identification. For designers and brands creating YouTube content, VidIQ optimizes for discovery. Its value lies in data-driven YouTube optimization.

name: Happy Editing
description: Happy Editing provides video editing resources, tutorials, and templates for learning professional editing techniques and workflows. Content covers various editing software and creative approaches. For designers learning video editing, Happy Editing offers educational resources. Its value lies in accessible video editing education.

name: Ungrid
description: Ungrid is an experimental grid tool from Uninspired Studio for creating unique, unconventional grid-based layouts that break from traditional constraints. The tool encourages creative exploration of layout design. For designers seeking experimental layouts, Ungrid enables creative grid exploration. Its value lies in challenging conventional grid thinking.

name: Video to ASCII
description: Video to ASCII converts video to real-time ASCII art representation directly in the browser, creating animated text-based visualizations from video input. The tool processes video frames into character-based output. For designers seeking experimental video effects, Video to ASCII provides unique output. Its value lies in creative video transformation.

name: Newhead Design
description: Newhead Design is a design agency portfolio showcasing work and providing inspiration for designers through featured projects and creative approaches. The site demonstrates professional design excellence. For designers seeking portfolio inspiration, Newhead Design shows professional presentation. Its value lies in demonstrating quality agency work.

name: Motion Boutique
description: Motion Boutique provides After Effects plugins and tools for motion designers, specializing in animation efficiency and creative effects. Products include popular tools for motion graphics workflows. For motion designers using After Effects, Motion Boutique enhances productivity. Its value lies in professional motion design tools.

name: 21st.dev
description: 21st.dev is a curated collection of modern development resources including tools, libraries, and best practices for contemporary software development. The platform aggregates quality developer resources. For designers working with developers, 21st.dev provides insight into modern development. Its value lies in curated development resources.

name: Unicorn Studio
description: Unicorn Studio is a WebGL visual effects editor for creating stunning effects without code, including particle systems, shaders, and interactive graphics. Effects export for use in web projects. For designers seeking advanced visual effects, Unicorn Studio enables no-code creation. Its value lies in accessible WebGL effects.

name: Motion for React
description: Motion for React provides examples and demos of Framer Motion animations, offering interactive references for implementing React animations. The collection showcases various animation techniques and patterns. For designers and developers learning Motion, the examples provide practical guidance. Its value lies in actionable animation references.

name: Plunk
description: Plunk is an open-source email platform for transactional and marketing emails, offering self-hosted and cloud options with modern developer experience. Features include templates, analytics, and API access. For designers and developers needing email infrastructure, Plunk provides open-source flexibility. Its value lies in open-source email capabilities.

name: Notion Templates
description: Notion Templates is the official gallery of templates for Notion, offering free options for productivity, project management, and personal organization. Templates cover diverse use cases from individuals to teams. For designers organizing with Notion, the template gallery accelerates setup. Its value lies in official, quality Notion templates.

name: Notionland
description: Notionland is a curated marketplace for Notion templates offering premium and free options for various professional and personal uses. Templates are organized by category and use case. For designers seeking Notion templates, Notionland provides curated options. Its value lies in quality template curation.

name: Super
description: Super transforms Notion pages into fast, beautiful websites without coding, adding custom domains, themes, and SEO to Notion content. The platform enables Notion as a CMS for public sites. For designers and brands using Notion, Super enables web publishing. Its value lies in bridging Notion to public websites.

name: Thenty
description: Thenty is a no-code website builder focused on design flexibility and ease of use for creating modern websites without coding. The platform emphasizes visual design capabilities and templates. For designers building sites without code, Thenty provides intuitive creation. Its value lies in design-focused no-code building.

name: Outseta
description: Outseta is an all-in-one platform for startups combining payments, authentication, CRM, and email marketing in a single tool. The platform reduces tool sprawl for early-stage companies. For designers and founders launching products, Outseta simplifies startup infrastructure. Its value lies in consolidating essential startup tools.
